name: HxHxH = Hajimari wa H kara: Daisuki Dakara, Daikirai!
HXH
summary: "HXH: Battle All One" is an action-packed fighting game. Players can choose from a variety of characters, each with their own unique fighting styles and special abilities. With fast-paced gameplay mechanics and the innovative "magic/kai" system, this game offers endless hours of entertainment.
